channel.title: When I run Client
channel.description:
When I run this client, I get an error that says
Could not find the main class:Jframe. Program will now exit.
Any ideas? Here is the code for my run client. [code]@echo off title Blank start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT[/code]

item.title: When I run Client
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

It means that the Jframe class either cannot be found, or does not exist.

Replace ‘Jframe’ in the batch code, with the name of your main client class, which will most likely be either ‘client’ or ‘Gui’.

Read full topic
